A little about myself..

Hi I'm Jordan! I am a Central Florida native with a passion for code, creating and problem solving. While my coding journey started relatively recently I've had the opportunity to complete a full-stack bootcamp progam where I not only got to learn the fundamentals of html, css and javascript but I was also introduced to a slew of front and backend technologies and concepts that we were then able to use to build a small libarary of tools, games and projects.
